Chapter.Name: PRIVILEGES AND IMMUNITIES, DIPLOMATIC AND CONSULAR RELATIONS, ETC

ExternalData.Titlesect: Optional Protocol to the Convention on Special Missions concerning the compulsory settlement of disputes

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 21 June 1985, in accordance with article VII(1).

TreatyNote.Text: The present Protocol was opened for signature by all States which could become Parties to the Convention, from 16 December 1969 unitl 31 December 1970 at United Nations Headquarters in New York.
